name: Broken Hearts Club - Blue Bird Blues
name_original: Broken Hearts Club - Blue Bird Blues
description:
Broken Hearts Club - Blue Bird Blues is a dating game with layers upon layers of choices that interweave into your dates emotions and is officially the prequel to Necronomistore.
Will you choose to show your true soul or let them walk over you?
Will you choose to break a heart even if it was the right thing to do?
Many questions and more await in the first instalment of the epic Broken Hearts Club series

  • Unique mood system which resets every situation, allowing the user to push and prod and figure out their dates likes and dislikes without stumbling and receiving a bad ending.
  • Prevent life or death situations!
  • Be completely rude or kind in the face of adversity.
  • Epic locations such as The Fun-Fair, A sprawling metropolis, A scorching beach!
  • Discover more about the main conspirator of the Necronomistore series.
  • Explore perhaps the cleanest depiction of Hell in all of fiction.
  • Retcon the events of Necronomistore itself by embracing your true self.

FAQ:
Q - Do I need to play Necronomistore to understand this game?
A - No, apart from a few visual gags and references, this is a completely standalone game.

Q - Do I need to play any other sequels to understand this game?
A - Nope, although this is the first in the Broken Hearts Club series, this is a self contained story and experience.

Q - Wait... this game is set within hell?
A - At first glance, the scenery looks far from what you would see in the underworld but hints of dead trees, bones and exotic demonic wildlife will truly hammer home that the location can be more harmful than it might first appear.
